description: This file defines the main React component 'App' for a Tic Tac Toe web application. It manages game state, handles user interactions, and renders the UI including the game board, status messages, scoreboard, and control buttons.

methods.name: App
methods.description: Main React functional component managing the Tic Tac Toe game state and UI.

methods.name: handleSquareClick
methods.description: Handles user clicks on a game board square, updates game state, and manages game logic such as determining winners or draws.

methods.name: newRound
methods.description: Resets the game board for a new round while alternating the starting player.

methods.name: resetAll
methods.description: Resets the game board and scores to initial state.
